name: Etched Unveiling
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Over the span of one minute, you brush your hand across a surface or object, leaving trace amounts of acid that work their way into the object. After one minute, the acid will have etched the name of all creatures that have touched the object or surface within the past 24 hours.

If the amount of names exceeds the amount of space on the target, only a blot of acid damage will be shown.
